noun.description: (in the New Testament) God as father.
examples: Abba, Father, he said, all things are possible to you

noun.description: Father (often as a familiar form of address in Muslim families).

proper noun.description: A Swedish pop group that became popular in the 1970s with catchy, well-crafted songs such as Waterloo (1974) and Knowing Me Knowing You (1977).

origin: Via Greek from Aramaic 'abbā father; sense 2 is from Urdu abbā, from Arabic ab.
